name: Jozo
description:
Jozo is a short but fun and challenging platformer!

Complete the game and get a special reward on our official discord server!

First of all, thank you for checking out our game. Jozo has been made by Sworn. A small indie game dev group from Bosnia & Herzegovina. This is our first game ever! We made it in 2 weeks. We are very ambitious and motivated to make fun games. Please follow and support us on this mission.

Become one of our first (or even the first) supporters on twitter and discord:

https://twitter.com/SwornIndie

https://discord.gg/MtpUJY7

Music is by Vindsvept
